questions.question: An electronic circuit having one or more than one input and only one output is called _____
The symbol represents _____
The logical expression Y=A.B represents
The symbol represents _____
The logical expression Y=A+B represents
The output of a two-input AND gate is high if one of the following conditions is met.
The symbol represents
The NOT gate is also called ______
In logic gate, 0 represents
The output of a two-input OR gate is low if one of the following conditions is met.
One of the following is not a type of logic gate
How does a logic gate function?
options: Using the flow of electric current
By using energy from a chemical reaction
questions.answer: Using the flow of electric current

questions.question: Which of the following gates can function on a single input?
When an input signal 1 is applied to a NOT gate, the output is _____
An OR gate has 4 inputs. One input is high and the other three are low. The output is_____
options: May be high or low depending on relative magnitude of inputs

questions.question: The output will be LOW for any case when one or more inputs are zero in a/an_____
The logic gate that will have HIGH or '1' at its output when any one of its inputs is HIGH is a/an _____ gate.
______ input values will cause an AND logic gate to produce a HIGH output.
options: At least one input is HIGH
At least one input is LOW
